{{Description|"Everyone knows that magicians will intentionally misdirect the audience... Ah, yes, while you were looking my way, the hat and assistant over there have both disappeared... Fascinating, is it not?"}}
'''Bewildering Lights''' is [[Lyney]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|5}}
* This Elemental Skill can be used in [[Aiming Mode]]. If used, Lyney will exit Aiming Mode.
